thread.section_title: The 2 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 2 Week Diet | www.2weekdiet.com
thread.title: chervi
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by chervi

author: chervi
title: chervi
text: Having been a little sceptical at the start - I have tried and failed at other diets before, I decided to give the 2 week diet a go. I am so glad I did. Almost from the start I began to lose weight and this gave me the motivation to see this diet through. At the end I found that I had lost fat from my thighs and waist and generally feel and had more energy. I would definitely urge others to give this diet a try. Trust me, you won't regret it and you will look and feel so much better.
